mapper.insert: INSERT INTO YOMUL_MEMBERS(NO, EMAIL, PW, NICKNAME, HASHSALT, SUBSCRIBE) VALUES('M'||YOMUL_MEMBERS_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{pw}, #{nickname}, #{hashsalt}, #{subscribe})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(EMAIL) FROM YOMUL_MEMBERS WHERE LOWER(EMAIL) = LOWER(#{email})
SELECT COUNT(NICKNAME) FROM YOMUL_MEMBERS WHERE LOWER(NICKNAME) = LOWER(#{nickname})
